1: <sup>1</sup> Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:
2: <sup>2</sup> Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.
3: <sup>3</sup> The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.
4: <sup>4</sup> The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
5: <sup>5</sup> Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
6: <sup>6</sup> Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:
7: <sup>7</sup> Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
8: <sup>8</sup> Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.
